section.use-prompt: Start a conversation with this prompt

message.create-prompt-tips:
You can use variables in your prompt, enclose them with curly braces, e.g. {variable_name}. 
_Use no more than 20 alphanumeric characters or underscore for variable name._
message.use-prompt-tips: Replace variables in your prompt template with real values, then pick a model to start a new conversation.
message.delete-prompt-warning:
Deleted prompt cannot be recovered.
Do you still want to proceed?
